content: I am unable to invert the video of the cam.  Extremely disappointed.
title: Very Disappointed with Cam

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: DerrickR
content: WiFi antenna, as others have said, isn’t very strong. However picture quality and motion sensor are excellent. Pair with a subscription and the app and your set. Highly recommend Ring’s Alarm system as well.
title: Great little cam.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: huhu
content: Ok it doesn't pick up on the dogs walking around and I don't know why it's not the angle we've tried but I'm ok with that. Other than that ut works fine. Night vision is a little blurry but still ok.
title: Pretty good

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: britneyg3
content: They are awful. My phone goes off constantly when a shadow form my tree moves, but people will pull in and out of my driveway and it won’t notify me. I mess with the settings daily and still haven’t got it figured out.
title: Don’t waste your money.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Carol Rosado
content: We have two other ring products, and this one has been an issue since the day it came out of the box. It can’t be used because it always says “critically low battery”. This defeats the purpose of buying a wired camera. 🙄🙄🙄🙄
title: This product would be great if it was useable

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Pam M
content: I got these installed on June 2, 2020 and loved them. Then on the weekend of the 14th one of the batteries was dead. I thought maybe because of my dogs being in and out so sloughed it off. Now the second Ring battery is low. And hardly any activity on this camera. So don’t believe it when it says that the battery will last 6 months. One month at best. Otherwise I love them but disappointed in the battery life because I don’t do ladders so I’ll have to ask for help.
title: Battery doesn’t last as long as it says

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Melissa S.
content: We have a Ring doorbell at the front of our house and love it. We have a large backyard with a big garage toward the back. This helps give us peace of mind that we can now see back there if anything should happen!
title: Integrates with other Ring products seamlessly!

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: John S
content: It’s so easy to set up and the video is clear and crisp. The audio is amazing. I purchased a spare battery I can swap out when it’s low. I’m going to set up one on every corner of my home and in my yard to capture wildlife.
title: I’m so happy I purchased this wireless Camera!

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Phoutheva Schmidt
content: Where the heck is the POE?  I am not going to run extension cords or hard wire outlets on the exterior of my house and rely on vulnerable 2.4 ghZ wifi for my cameras.  I will be returning these cameras.  And buy the elite
title: No POE!

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: A.J. N.
content: Great product, easy to install and works as advertised. The battery life is satisfactory but I suggest buying an extra one. I’m not easy to make happy but this is a great product. I highly recommend it.
title: Great product

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Chilanta
content: Purchased new, product stopped working within a month.  Ring support said just a bad unit but wants my credit card to replace it.  Bad product and customer service
title: Wasted money!

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: C. Shepard
content: This camera doesn’t work with any consistency. I’ve spent too much time on the phone with customer service and still it’s a disappointment. Better to invest a little more money if you actually care about monitoring your home. The battery drains quickly, the motion section is random and the zones are too limited.
title: Not worth saving the pennies

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: LatinTemptress
content: Great cameras, although I wish they were less expensive. I like the night vision feature as well as the speakers that you can talk through. In these uncertain times, these cameras give me a little peace of mind.
title: GREAT CAMERAS

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Al-Razouqi
content: Whenever live view works it's great, however 80-90% of the time it won't connect. It does record though while on the trial period, I haven't subscribed after the issues with live view. My Internet  connection can't be the issue because it's at 40 MBs and I stream videos with no issue. Ring specifies you require a minimum of 1 MBs speed. Plus all the cams except 1 are at full wifi signal. Therefore I can conclude the issue is either from the cams or their server's. I wish I would have bought just 1 for a tryout, but I got 5.
title: Terrible live view

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: BuyerofThings
content: Worse than the ring doorbell! Can’t connect. Great WiFi at location. Can’t adjust range of motion detection.
title: Just get a regular security system

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Eric R.
content: Cameras work great, but I would recommend getting some extra batteries if you plan on putting these in high traffic areas. In my kitchen the camera will require a batter change every 7-10 days. If you can install next to an outlet and use the plug in camera I would recommend that
title: Get extra batteries

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Wei Shen
content: I would call this a toy. First, when charged with battery alone, it doesn’t provide too much motion detection or alarm because the camera is in low energy consumption mode. Second, a fully charged battery can only be used for 3-4 weeks. Third, I bought a solar panel to charge the battery. The solar panel didn’t work. It is just a toy.
title: It is just a fancy toy

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Doug3815
content: I also bought a solar panel for this camera so I would not have to worry about recharging the battery. This Ring camera works great, I have 5 of them and I have zero complaints
title: Works great

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Lori
content: Terrible product! The camera gets “stuck” while on which results in a drained battery, battery lasts one... maybe two days. I was contacted by Ring who said someone would reach out to help solve my problem but never heard back from anyone! Update:  I was contacted by Jason who was amazing!! He listened to my issues and sent me a replacement Ring at no cost. It works perfectly and I am super happy with the product. I’ve been using it a little over a week and battery life is still at 93%.
title: Updated review

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Hector Paredes
content: I bought this as an indoor camera, I didn’t give it 5 starts because I wished the battery lasted longer, it take 2 days to charge fully and it last about a month. Would recommend buying a plug in. I have one of those and it works perfectly.
title: Wished battery lasted longer.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: jrsygrl109
content: I like that an outdoor cam came out without flood lights which I do not need for the area I needed extra coverage. Not sure about battery usage yet but if it's as good as my ring doorbell I'll be very happy
title: Well worth the money

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: DCMetro
content: Ring makes it so easy to install these. Love that. Does it’s job well too. What else is there to say :) Just wish they’d included the wall mount like they used to earlier. My prior camera had it.
title: Great indoor camera!

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Bryce
content: Easy setup and control of the camera via phone. Long lasting battery-the charge can be time consuming. Would recommend for home security-great benefit of seeing those nearby in your neighborhood who utilize similar devices and post updates regarding activities caught on camera.
title: Great product for the price

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Chadd
content: Battery was DOA. Left it charging over night and it was still dead
title: Quality control

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Cesar R. Chajon
content: Live camera feed is not very reliable. Camera notify me that there is motion but does not allow me to see live feed. It sometimes takes up to an hour to start working. I have 2 stick up cameras and they both do not respond at the exact same time. I also have a ring door bell but that never has a problem connecting and allows me to see live feed any time. Maybe the ring spotlight camera will work better.
title: Not reliable

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Ms. Cronicle A. Jackson
content: The product was fine.  The packaging was not so great.  It looked like there was some type of oil running down the camera box.  The inside of the shipping box was oily, as well.  No idea what it was.
title: Product fine, packaging, not so much.  No impact on camera.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Scott Williamson
content: Purchased this to mount under the eaves of my house.  When mounted upside down, the image can not be rotated on the app.  If you purchased a cheaper indoor cam, it rotates no problem.  This $100 camera requires you to buy a separate mount for $20.  I asked if they could send me one and they stated they didn't have any in stock....but I could purchase one online and it will be there in two days! Ridiculous.  It should have either come with the mount or figure out how to rotate it.  Ring fail....
title: Not for mounting upside down!

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Judy Marie Jirasek
content: I ordered a white and black cam. The white is 2nd generation and the black is 3rd generation. I didn't notice until I receive them. The 2nd generation is better in my opinion. I wish I realized it when I ordered. I mainly use the cams to monitor my pets, but some reason it doesn't detect them.
title: Black cam is 3rd generation

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: rc
content: Bought this last October 2019. And we've only been using it indoors as we also have a ring doorbell. We haven't fully used it as the battery needs to be charged almost everyday. We're lucky if it lasts for 2 days. Connection is not so good. I can see ok when i do live video but  the voice connection is so poor. Waste of money. Can't even return it anymore. Even the ring doorbell connection is not good and it takes a long time to load.
title: Battery life bad

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Matt Creager
content: This camera is excellent for the price. We’ve had a Ring doorbell for years and have really liked it. We bought this to keep an eye on our cat while away for 2 weeks on vacation with a friend checking in a few times. Worked flawlessly and the video quality is excellent.
title: Excellent

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: JSD
content: Great little camera! This is my third ring that’s now in place along with a ring chime booster. All of the installations were easy. I’ve had no issues. The view on all is excellent. An affordable way to peace of mind. And just one thing; being called a stick up cam, one might think they could simply stick it up. How nice would that be? Mounting a base with two small screws (included) is required.
title: Great little camera

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Dawn Szefler
content: Seems to work when it wants to more than when it should. It captures video for about 30-60 seconds then when the person reappears or exits the house it fails to video again. Sometimes my app fails to properly record video and all i get is a black screen.
title: Sometimes iffy

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Paul Brennan
content: I gave it 3 stars in Motion detection because it didn't always catch movement, and 4 stars overall because they make you pay extra for a service for each devise in order to save recordings. I didn't know about the service until after I got my 2 cameras. Only 30.00 per year for each device, but disappointing that they want an annual fee.
title: Good security

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Ronald Mowry
content: Received an open box. The box had been opened. So far I have tried to activate one of the two cameras. It does not respond. I have connected Ring Tech and we have determined the camera does not function. Why did I get an opened box when I purchased new?
title: Item was opened when I got it and do not work

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: doggydaycare
content: I have this in our garage/workshop.  This works great, for monitoring activity.  Works great with our existing Ring devices, clarity at anything greater than 10 ft is marginal.
title: Garage installation

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: EthanAndLiamHD
content: What can I say other than they work seamlessly with our other ring products. motions detection a great, night vision is great and picture/sound quality are also great.
title: i love ring products

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: S. Contreras
content: Crystal clear views and this camera does not disappoint at night. I am so glad we bought this. I highly recommended it if you need to see your property.
title: Exactly What We Needed

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Sara
content: Highly recommend it to families has babies, it will be easier than a baby camera if you already have ring products, since you don’t need to download a different app.  Battery is good too.  And most important, portable design is so convenient.
title: Life is easier

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Cindy B
content: The system works great, but only for a short time. There was a vague reference to a plan but we have to subscribe now to see anything but live shots. No pricing given so no idea how expensive this will be! Will not recommend this to anyone
title: Hidden fees

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: ruth mcbride
content: Never picked up motion in front of it  Very disappointed in item. Thought it was a good choice but did not detect any movement. My neighbor has ring doorbell that’s eBay I should have bought
title: Disappointed

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: The Doctor
content: This package comes with the solar panel for charging and nevers runs out of power even under partial sun conditions. Excellent buy and definitely worth the price.
title: Excellent value for security.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kris A
content: I find it pretty ridiculous that I can’t get connectivity to my 257 mbps WiFi network in a 967sq ft condo. Yes I’ve restarted my router, yes I’ve tested my speeds, yes I called my provider... Also, why no 5g internet compatibility? It would make a lot of sense to be able to use this over 5g speeds. UPDATE: Changed to 5 stars - after calling up to Ring Customer Service, they walked me through how to fix the issues step-by-step and were extremely knowledgeable and friendly! Excellent company and great customer service!
title: Can’t even connect UPDATE: MUCH BETTER! GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Laura Berk
content: Does a great job in letting me know what it going on outside. Super easy to install and set up. No complaints at all.  I installed two of these around my pool area and near my sliders.  The alerts work perfectly.
title: Perfect for my pool area

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Norma
content: I use one through the window and you can see good in the daylight and in the dark  very happy with them I have 3  I want more but at almost 100 bucks a piece I’m hoping for a sale
title: Works though the glass great camera

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: NJ Contributor
content: Well priced unit for indoor use. As any Ring product, easy to install and configure. With the paid plan, a must if you own Ring products, you are able to record, view unlimited videos.
title: Great indoor Ring product

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Estrella
content: Bought this since we were headed out of town. It worked for a day, dropped WiFi connection and never connected again. Restart/reset can only be done in person. Returned it. If you’re having issues connecting fast I recommend the Rapid Ring app, it does seem to connect faster since that’s its only purpose.
title: Lost Connection and Stopped Working

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Chris J Caldwell
content: This camera does exactly what I was looking for.  The night and day resolution is excellent.  Couldn’t be happier.
title: “Great camera”

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: DPerry
content: Just got this in the other day. Downloaded the app and followed the instructions to install the camera.  Everything went like clockwork. I can connect to the camera with my phone changing the different modes. Works great, then I tried to watch a video. All I get is a streaming error. This camera does everything, but video. Tech support is nonexistent as well.
title: Disappointing

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Donacianna
content: I love this pictures on this camera. Clean and clear. Beware of wifi connection. If you don't have a good one this camera is spotty. A little delay but I think it has to do with my wifi and not camera.
title: Nice

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Hector
content: Honestly i been having a problem that is the battery drains so fast even with the solar panel...ots starts from 40 to 0 in less than an hour in some cases
title: battery draining

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Richard
content: I have not had any problems with it. You do have to pay for the monthly video service.
title: I like it.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jesse C. Peffer
content: Very easy to set up and has a wide view range. Can’t make out people’s faces unless the camera is  right at the door. So we may need to get a few additional cameras for that. We are putting a few in our barn to keep our eye on the horses while we are gone. I wish it would start recording as soon as motion is detected, seems that there is a 20 second delay. A lot can happen in 20 seconds. If the delivery guy runs up and places a package on the porch it doesn’t capture it in the recording, only shows him leaving.
title: Love it. Only one flaw so far

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: T. Paddy
content: The camera is a ring but it is not registering any activity in my yard but my other camera does, why?  I cannot speak to night vision as its not taking any pics... trying to get it worked out.
title: Its a ring but its behaving like a doorstop

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Katwoman81383
content: This is a great product.  It wasn’t what I was looking for but if you want an in house camera it’s perfect.  The size is great and the features are as described.
title: Great little camera

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Vin’s Adventures
content: For $99 bucks and easy install well worth it. There is a $30 annual charge to save videos for 60 days. You can download/share any saved video if needed for longer than the 60 day cloud storage. Curious to see how long battery lasts but I've heard for months with normal usage. So far it's been a winner!
title: Best security for $99 bucks!

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: CAPS
content: Its works good. Its compatible with Alexa and Alexa let me know who is at front when I look the camera in the phone. I have 4 of them. They're all good.
title: Work with Alexa!

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Chappy
content: Wow, terrible connectivity  ! I've done everything including purchasing a mesh wifi network which literally has me connected 3 houses away with my laptop, my tablet and my cell phone but this stick up camera that's less than 50 feet away continues to drop signal. I'm at the end of my patients with this product. Good chance it's getting set back.
title: Terrible Connectivity

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Wendy J Sanchez
content: They work as I expected them to mounting outside was easy and they seam secure quality video is obviously great! We love them. Only had for a few days will update if there is anything we dislike :) early installation they took all night to charge up but that’s not a big deal for me also I like that I don’t need to take the cameras down just to charge them
title: Great quality

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Billy Greer
content: I have 4 ring cameras, this one being the newest one. I like my spot light cam and the last gen stick up cam way more. This one does not have very good motion coverage  like my other ring cams. Also, I am having a big problem with condensation in the mornings, where it's so bad that it does not pick me up walking 3ft I front of it at 4am. Poor cam,I should have got another spot light cam
title: Not as good as last model

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Josh tackitt
content: Very happy with this camera! I got it with the solar panel. If you buy this w/solar panel make sure during setup you do not choose wired mode though. I recommend this to friends and family.
title: Very impressed and happy with the stick up cam

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: donald
content: Added two of these cameras to my Ring system. Installations were easy and after adding a WiFi extender they all are working well along with my Ring Doorbell.
title: Easy installation

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Ina
content: Using for indoor use. Been great for monitoring and the view at night is very good. Nice you can angle it and set up many different ways. Great addition to our other ring products.
title: Great mobile camera

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: KK
content: I do not recommend this product. I have had nothing but issues. I’ve had to call customer support a couple times and still having issues. I can sit right in my home and watch someone walk up on my porch and this camera does not activate/ record them. Waste of money !!
title: Not worth the money

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Patricia Herndon
content: Overall the Ring meets all expectations Except a 60 to 120 second delay after motion notification before you can see the what the notification details. The processing time after notification is slow which doesn’t help me if someone is breaking in my house.
title: Too long to process the motion detection

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: lynn melton
content: 100% regret this purchase. Unless i am viewing it live it captures nothing of importance. If the wind blows my flag it captures that but if a person comes to my porch it doesn't activate. Im very saddened by the fact that I got this for a form of protection yet all it picks up is the wind blowing and never a human.
title: Would not recommend

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Lemuel M.
content: This is a very good cam and i can bring it anywhere. The reason i’m giving it a 4 star if there is no on/off button. It would be nice to switch it off if u don’t need it instead of using up the batt 24/7 when not needed
title: Good mobile cam but no on/off switch

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Nancy Fudge
content: Battery didn’t last too long (4 days). Changed settings and got another battery and seemed to work better. Maybe something wrong with first battery? Not sure but now it seems to last longer.
title: Get extra batteries

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: MEA
content: After setting up the camera which took quite a bit to charge it’s now all working well, solar panel and camera. Camera has stayed charged with solar panel.
title: Works as it should

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Clarence Cheung
content: Working better than what I expect. I added solar panel with it. So don’t need to worry about replacing battery. Working great with the little solar panel. I am using non ring solar panel. Cheaper but same function.
title: Good outdoor camera with solar panel

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Anthony V. Andrews
content: I have installed two of these units at two different home locations and they both work well. What you need to know is that after the initial "free" trial on the recording option, until you pay for the subscription the unit pretty much stops working for live viewing or anything else. The cost is reasonable, about $30.00/yr. but it seems a little sleazy to hold us ransom for it.
title: Product works well , but.........

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Household Bank
content: I received the cameras as scheduled, but upon opening them, camera was completely shattered. I was only able to use 1 out of 2. I requested a replacement immediately, i didn't request a refund because i already have a ring doorbell and alarm and so far i am happy with them.
title: Came completely shattered!

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Davey Jones
content: Ring camera's picture is very sharp I know it says HD quality but still skeptical if it is really HD.  Motion detector can be changed from strong to sensitive
title: camera

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Tzu-Min O.
content: False advertisement. In the technical details of the plug-in camera, it says "Adjustable motion zones (Advanced Motion Detection for this product coming soon)". There is no such option in the Ring app whatsoever. See the screenshot. There is only a button to toggle on/off and a laughable bar to adjust the sensitivity.
title: No adjustable motion zone

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Tom & Emily
content: Amazon seems to have re-designed the mounting for this camera. They no longer include the super flexible mount that used to come with these cameras. That is now a separate $20 purchase. The camera itself does work well.
title: Using this outside.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Walter Giles
content: My experience, and for me the bottom line from the many excellent reviews, is that battery life is awful — WAY less than advertised.  You can’t travel for any length of time because the battery will die.  Nothing else matters if the thing is dead.
title: Battery life very poor

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Rajan Kapur
content: This camera does not show the Live view. When I click on the live view button, it says “ Activating device”,  keeps spinning and eventually times out. The strange part is that it logs the Live view in the events and I can see the recording, but it won’t show the Live view from the button. It’s really frustrating!
title: Live view does not work

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: geoff
content: The battery life is really good. Better than I expected. Only thing is it doesn’t pick up motion any further than like 20-25 feet. Other than that it has a very clear image and I like the UI of the mobile app
title: Good for the price

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Bld12
content: Installed today. So far so good! Works seamlessly with my two Ring doorbells.
title: Great addition to the Ring family.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kodi
content: Disappointed, I should have done more research before purchasing this camera. No integration with Samsung ST or Echo show 5. The only way to view videos are through the ring app.
title: Disappointed

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Benmat
content: Easy to setup. I added it to environment with already one ring camera and was very easy to setup. App is great, can see all cameras in one view. Would highly recommend.
title: Good product. great quality and works well.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Amy Popham
content: We don't use an Alexa, but we have 2 battery stick ups the ring doorbell. Never have had a problem. The battery last about 6 months before we charged them. I have an extra battery charged ready to change out.
title: Stick up cameras

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: T. Boss
content: Terrible picture. Doesn't connect often. Sends alerts late. Broke after 1 month.
title: Horrible product

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: ErikEE
content: Easy install, great battery life.
title: Would buy again

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: karkarnbear
content: Absolutely Fantastic! Easy to set up. Easy to install. Provides a great view of your yard or wherever you install it!!! Highly Recommended.
title: Ring outdoor battery Cam

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Sofia V
content: Easy set up, in house security. You can put this any were,even facing out a window. We use it to monitor our dog and cat when away. Well worth 100.00.
title: Decent anywhere you go security.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: christina kelley
content: I dislike that  by the time it tells you  it senses a motion the person is already inside the house and it gets a recording of the door closing, but AFTER they are inside. We had to add a second one at a different location in the yard and link them together to get it to work  better.
title: Slow to notify on app and slow to  record some motions.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Russ Hasting
content: Can get great quality video sometimes, but mostly not. Horrible connectivity. Cant do live view. Cant change coverage area. Kinda wish i wouldve gone with something of higher quality
title: Not so great. Cheap but get what you pay for

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Diana
content: great gadget
title: does what its supposed to do

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: JLopez
content: I've noticed that it doesnt always pick up motion so I'm playing with the settings and zone. Its is a great camera and has a clear video when it does capture motion. I use it with the ring doorbell and they help me feel safe.
title: Serves its purpose

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: MyrnaH
content: I set this up in my garage so that I could make sure the garage door was closed when I wasn’t home. It worked about a month and a half. It was a waste of money.
title: Doesn’t work after a month and a a half.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: ABW
content: I decided to add the Ring Stick-Up Camera as an extension to my existing security system.  It has been a great choice.  The camera picks up movement really well.  The range settings are easy to use.  And now I am alerted when the neighbor's cat enters my yard!
title: Extra Protection

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Chris H
content: Overall great camera. Must get the solar or be ready to change the batteries. Camera saved me a major headache since my car was hit while parked out front of my house and the driver drove off.
title: Great camera

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: James Howard, Jr.
content: great product with excellent wifi range.  Connecting to base is a breeze. Visuals are clear and proper color. I only wish the battery lasted longer
title: ring products are a 👍 great value for the price.  Ring customer service was excellent

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: matt
content: garbage product! wouldnt even work out of the box. clearly no QC when it comes to their product. will be returning this and going with a brand that actually works. what a waste!
title: dont waste you money on this product

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Brian Zimmerman
content: After the neighbors had their tires slashed we decided enough is enough.  See everyone moves to the west coast of Florida for a better life yet they bring the east coast with them.  We bought this with the solar panel and a mount.  It took 15 minutes to hang up and about 5 minutes to configure.  The picture is clear, motion sensor is adjustable and it gives my wife piece of mind.
title: Piece of mind

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Shannon-Lee E.
content: Works great inside and outside the house. It doesn’t work if you have it behind a window facing outside. The sensor will not work. Otherwise it works great
title: Love it

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: TIMOTHY
content: The product works great the angle of your view is small and you have to have a WiFi connection that his strong to the area you want to view
title: Wider view needed

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: ramin samari
content: We have a large backyard and need a good security system. Ring products including the camera are great! The camera has clear view day and night.
title: Easy steup, great resolution

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: WillieWill
content: Nice set up and how it works with Alexa. Been months and yet to need to charge the batteries. I got these for the mobility of having a camera u can pick up and move where needed. Easy to set up with the existing cameras.
title: Awesome buy

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: joan m
content: Am thrilled with the over all performance of this unit. It’s new to me so time will tell about longevity of unit and battery capabilities. Very easy setup. No problems connecting or aiming the lens.
title: Brand new battery operated Ring camera

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Iry
content: Started off great. Then it stopped working. Reset it countless times, troubleshotting to the point of exhaustion, bought a WiFi extender like Ring suggested, bought an extra battery, nothing works.  Finally called Ring support, they provided awesome support. Didn't work, they sent a replacement.
title: Ring - awesome support

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Penn Name
content: It needs to be charged constantly, the connectivity is garbage even though the router is four feet away. The microphone in the cameras is terrible. I have nothing good to say about these cameras other than the ease of installation. I’d give it zero stars if I could.
title: Absolute waste of money.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Great Gatsby
content: Love all my RING products.
title: Love all the RING products

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: T. R. VILLA
content: disappointed in the video quality, expected more from ring I guess they are screeching their products a bit and not testing for results
title: Good size and solar powered

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Dena
content: I love knowing that I can instantly see everything going on at my front door without having to stand on my porch, I feel a lot safer.
title: Feel safer

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: LarsB
content: Sometimes it would connect and other times it would not, indoors or outdoors. I may have had a bad unit. Ring has been good in the past.
title: intermittent problem with wifi connection

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Lewis
content: Good camera but I wish It could record 24/7.  Not sure why the batterie powered ones at least take pictures between motion and the powered one does not.
title: Good camera

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: matthew.r.bullis r
content: I was really excited about this but the two major downsides I have found 1. There is no way to continuous record even to a home server. 2. It only records a 30 second clip, we had an incident lasting more than a few minutes but all I got was a 30 second clip over night that did nothing for us. Even though motion was still occurring (with motion detection setting at the highest)
title: Not the best for meeting outdoor needs when you need it

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: john r. schwab
content: Your target needs to be close to see. If you are looking at an object at the end of your driveway the resolution is not that good. It is very easy to set up.
title: Only for close up objects

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: C. Markum
content: Reasonable Add-on camera for additional coverage. The motion detection was very good, the only thing I found was that It was showing the WiFi signal as much less in the area, than it actually was. I would still recommend this to family and friends.
title: Love it!

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: K.Gip
content: I really like this product. I have it mounted to the outside of my house. It fell a couple of times, and I’m unsure why. Other than that, I haven’t had any issues.
title: Great Item

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: RJ
content: The camera works fine.  I wanted to hang it above my garage door but the instructions were not clear.  It is possible I was missing a part/screw.  I have it sitting on my backyard table for the time being and I can see it on my phone just fine!
title: Instructions for installing are confusing.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Elias Stephan
content: Very good high quality camera. I have Ring video door bell 2 already. This was an easy addition to the app. Works great and the video is high quality.
title: Works as discribed

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Croz34
content: Don’t like notifications for a flag moving from wind.  Battery charge life is way overstated, I can get maybe 2 1/2 weeks from a full charge. Could be caused from all of the false notifications from picking up flag movement!  Night vision is not good unless I leave outside lights on all night.  I would not recommend for outside use.  WiFi is poor even with extender.
title: To many notifications and battery life per charge is overstated.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Paul S.
content: Ring requires another purchase to enable orientation rotation, Do Not But this is a huge problem I would Give 0 stars if that was available
title: Can't mount upside Down

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Doug
content: Great quality and incredibly easy set up. Use by itself or link it to other Ring cameras in your network for ultimate coverage while you’re away from your home.
title: Great quality and easy set up

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Evotrans
content: The first one came with either infected battery or defective solar panel but Amazon replaced it and the new one works perfectly
title: Battery Never Dies

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Ryan
content: Not happy with this version seems like they went with a low budget lens very grainy and ring needs to set up the WiFi range on these Arlo the way to go
title: Poor image quality

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: William Keith Little
content: We got it to add to our house system.  It was easy to add to the app and easy to program.  Really pleased with how clear the picture was.  It says it covers a 110 degree field of view, and we looked and from where it is we can see out entire back yard.  We might get a couple more.
title: Works good might get more

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: CH
content: Caught my neighbors chickens plotting against me.  They built a ladder out of twigs and hair and tried to climb into my yard.
title: Great for watching neighbors evil chickens.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Cyndi
content: Am happy with this security camera which I use on my RV. Had to leave it alone for a week and was on the other side of the country but still could see what was going on around my RV. Happy with it.
title: works as advertised.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Thunderbird
content: Unlike my Ring Doorbell, the audio quality sucks and is pretty much nonexistent. Checked wifi signal and it seems to be fine. Tried to get help customer support and it is apparently down also. Come on Ring! I'm souring on your whole deal.
title: Bad Audio / No Audio

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: JLMitch
content: I like the wide angle and the clarity of the camera. Easy to install and get up and running. Technical support is very helpful.
title: Very clear picture

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Shari Scheib
content: Love these Ring Cameras.  Great installation and app instructions. Love being able to monitor our home. Love the alarm feature too.  Get a back up battery and keep charged for quick battery change. Only seconds to change.
title: Great Affordable Monitoring Protection

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Cheese rider
content: Works great. Helps me get full coverage of my yard. Works in unison with my ring doorbell. Night vision is good too.
title: Works nice

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Amanda
content: No problems at all. Works great and so eaay to use the app to watch the camera I love my ring. Easy to hide in a spot became its a perfect size
title: Love my Ring

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kiku Sani
content: Already had fully charged battery for this device. It won't detect the full battery. I tried the other battery that came with it and the one I had in my doorbell and any battery in this device, shows critically low.
title: Doesn't work

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: C
content: Just wish I could turn off lights so people wouldn’t know they are being recorded.  So they won’t steal or vandalize it.
title: Nice black color

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Creamchizzle
content: Put mine outside. Bought this to replace 2 arlo cameras that we were overpaying security company for. So far so good. This along with two ring doorbells and soon to be another stick up for backyard should have my house pretty secure. Recommend getting the solar charger too. Works great and I have huge oaks in my yard.
title: Nice camera

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Bud
content: It’s a beautiful clear picture during the dayBut at night it does not work so well. It’s difficult to see unless the lights are on. And it hasn’t been notifying me very often of approaching guests.
title: It’s a beautiful clear picture during the day

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jennifer Schaeffer
content: Been wanting to get this for a long time!!!! I really like it. The app makes it nice because you can change things around the way you prefer. Only thing I haven’t liked is how long it takes to charge the battery. Hoping that it lasts a long time!!!
title: See who’s coming

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Rosie
content: I liked it so much I bought another one. One of my favorite features is that you can post things to your neighborhood blog and people interact with you. For ex: when theres theft around the neighborhood I can post it to the app.
title: Great Features and View

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Melissa Chiu
content: **Does not include video back up** once your promotion ends you only have live video.  So if you miss a notification or it’s even seconds late, you won’t see what caused the motion.  There are better options on the market that will over backup video.  Too great of an investment to then add $100/year for something that should be free.
title: **Does not include video back up**

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Charles Costa
content: I'm not an expert on security infrastructure, but I'd go as far as saying that Ring is so effective, that if the NYC Department of Corrections used these cameras, we would've known who killed Epstein immediately after the fact.
title: More effective than the cameras used by the NYC Department of Corrections

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Tank
content: Love the ring products Only negative is that those that are wired can be turned off while your doing something in that area without having to erase all of the activity!
title: Love ring devises

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Diana M. Merchant
content: I have several ring products that I love. This cordless indoor camera is horrible. The battery life is disgraceful. Won’t buy anymore ring products.
title: Battery life horriblr

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: a
content: Awful product, terrible reliability, ton of bugs and failures. Stay away!
title: Avoid at all cost!

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Judy Hickman
content: Bad field of view, keeps disconnecting from internet. Nothing like my ring doorbell. I have had it for less than 2 months and have had nothing but trouble, talked to one of Rings representatives for 2 hours today and could not resolve my issues. I am stuck with a piece of junk.
title: When battery goes dead you have to set it up again

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Holly Llebaria
content: Best cameras I've ever bought. These things are impressive. Definitely buy an extra battery so you can switch out quickly when the time comes.
title: Best cameras I've ever bought

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Geno617
content: Camera was always losing internet  connection and for that reason I had to send it back. My Arlo camera’s are so much more reliable.
title: Prefer Arlo camera.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Mary
content: I got this to put up over our garage. 2 screws is all it took to put up. The setup was very easy and the picture is great. I'm very happy with the purchase.
title: Camera with great picture

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: James Cayton
content: I love my ring cameras - I do not like having to pay the Ring fee and wish I could link them all but they work great
title: Love my Ring

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Destiny
content: Once your 30 day subscription is up it become useless I can’t see live feed it takes forever to load up. I don’t like the idea I feel I’m being forced in this subscription I was going to buy more ring products but this is not for me the subscription for life for something I already own I’m ok
title: Don’t fall for the hype

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: srblock
content: Very versatile camera, nice that you can put it anywhere and don’t need electrical. Picture quality is great day and night. Easy setup!
title: Convenient and dependable

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Mario
content: Dislike the changes to the app took away features that I have been using and liked trying to get them back. Have good WiFi signal but works slow. I have had then for a couple of years and Amazon has downgraded the software
title: Not the same

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Reverie
content: Perfect addition to my other 3 ring camera, Very clear even at night covers a very why range I think I love this one more than the others....
title: Love it

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: K. E. Pleasant
content: Does not work with att fiber, or a 5g modem/router
title: Only works on 2.4gz

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Joseph F.
content: This is one of seven Ring products I have and the second battery Ring cam.  The build quality is Apple-esque.  The video quality and the iPhone software are excellent.  Video can be downloaded and saved for later use if necessary.  Occasionally wifi issues.  But, not sure if this is a camera or internet provider issue.  I would and will buy this product in the future.
title: Great quality camera!

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Mark Rosenthal
content: I have more than 1 of these units and know what to expect. This unit didnt last 1 day before the battery was dead.
title: Battery didnt last 1 day.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Tom 7
content: Brand new product so you’d think it will allow “Snap Shot Capture” right?  Nope!  I’d hold off on purchasing this camera until they add this feature if this is a feature you find to be as important as I do. Very dissatisfied. Other than that it works okay outside. Motion sets off very easily and when you lower the sensitivity it doesn’t capture as quickly as I’d like it to.
title: No Snap Shot Capture on this “new” device.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Ana Bracamontes
content: This is my fifth camera , its like fort box. I xant tell you the peace of mind that I get from my ring products ..
title: Optimal value and safety

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Mark S.
content: When it works, it's great. But about half the time I try to connect to Live View, it cannot connect. I don't think it's a signal or speed issue, both are strong.
title: Does not always connect to Live View

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Moises Boss Estrada
content: I find the cameras to be a bit slow to respond with the application on my phone, can be a bit frustrating when you’re home, even slower when you are away.
title: cameras can be a bit slow to respond with application

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: George B. Daugherty
content: This is more a matter of preference for me. I have a ring doorbell pro already and thought this would be similar. I found out that the plug in and battery powered versions are very different. I highly recommend the plug in versions but the battery powered are just ok. This version is 2.4ghz only. I ended up with buying a plug in stick up cam that is duel band 2.4 and 5ghz.
title: Recommend the a plug-in instead

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Dutchman
content: Could not get it to link up with my Wifi ....no matter what.....everything else works in my home but the camera....sent it back.
title: Didn’t work for me

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Sexy beast
content: Cute little cam but smaller than I though.  It probably would have been sufficient to my need if the alarms was louder than my dishwasher.  I can't imaging it scaring off anyone.
title: DECIBELS *** VERY IMPORTANT ***IF IT DOESN'T LIST IT...DON'T BUY!  120 DB and above is good!

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kathy B.
content: It's actually a great picture. Fairly good range. The battery lasts a long time. I recommend a spare so you have one to change out instantly. We have the battery stick up motion light, too, and they complement each other. Just one spare battery between the two works fine. The last ring update doesn't let you pinch zoom in recorded video now. Only live view. I'm sure it's me and there something I've missed in the update lingo.
title: Good value for sure.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Steven L. Byers
content: Works well.  Easy to install. Long battery life.  In the spring I will set up the solar panel.  Great night vision.,
title: Works well.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Stacie Larsen
content: I bought the wireless camera for my living room, but haven’t used it, yet. I fully charged the battery and put the camera on my living room wall last night but had issues verifying my email address. I verified it the next day and tried linking the camera with my ring app, but the battery was already dead. I didn’t realize that I would have to charge it so often. It’s frustrating.
title: Disappointing purchase

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: cjm
content: Love the cameras we have 4 of them know they work very well. One of are camera caught a guy getting in to one of are truck one night
title: Worker very well

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Elizabeth
content: This was easy to set up, the quality of the picture is great! Does not seem to be affected by weather. Love all the features of this camera!
title: Easy set up & quality video

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: John
content: Camera clarity is OK but hard to see detail of faces. Zones are too narrow to catch distance. Battery life is short. Less than a month. Not a good option if you want to mount them on the wall. You'll have to constantly get to them to change the battery.
title: Battery life too short and image quality is average. Not for catching details.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: michael
content: The app is very laggy and the picture gets distorted often. The only reason we got these was because simply safe did not have outdoor cameras. This has been a waste of money because by the time I can view live, someone could already be inside the house.  Also, if you go straight to the app from a push notification, you cannot view the event that set it off right away. I do not recommend this product at all.
title: Laggy and glitchy

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Darrien Shelton
content: I love the features. The motion detection the LED lights the siren. There are a lot of features packed into this camera. The battery life is horrible though. Here I am 60 days in and both of the batteries inside the camera have gone dead! The reviews say it can last 6 months to a year on two batteries. I have the camera on all the low power settings. So I’m not sure where they are getting that.
title: Battery life sucks

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: J.Robinson
content: This camera could be great! If it wasnt for the 1 month battery life and the lag  between getting a notificationand actually being able to view the video. The lag time is my biggest complaint sometimes it can take 2 minutes or so. Sound on the speaker is also a little quiet. Other than that,the video looks great.
title: Almost there

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: CobraJ
content: I have in the front of the house so that it covers both of the streets of our corner house. The battery has lasted over six weeks.
title: Battery life is better than expected with good motion detection

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Jose
content: Takes too long to notify you of movement , video os all over the place, it just fails to deliver what is promised!
title: Go with another brand

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Cameron A. Stante
content: The battery is used up in less than two weeks. That’s unacceptable! These are a new version! My advice: don’t buy.
title: Stay away from these

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Craig Family
content: Works as advertised......easy to set up and works. Well remotely.  Time will tell on the battery although so far the discharge rate is great.
title: Great buy, easy to set up

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Legit
content: Pretty good, but has a slow reaction time and sometimes only is activated from close up regardless of sensitivity settings.
title: Ok but slow activation

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: TheSwede
content: The camera was easy to setup and connect to my network. The solar panel I also bought easily charges the camera.
title: Easy setup and good video

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: RICHARD RASSEGA
content: To big not right for what I wanted it for
title: To bg

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Wanda Marie
content: Love this. Now I can see what my pets are up to when I'm not home. My daughter uses hers for her barn to watch her horses
title: Great little camera

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Charles W
content: I have Very slow response when opening ring app. By they way, the shipping was very bad without box.
title: Slow response

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Lynnede
content: Had it setup and working within 10 mins.  Love the ring products so much I bought this as a gift and it was a huge hit.
title: Easiest setup. Love this product.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Paris
content: It is a good camera, but it had problems connecting to the live view. It takes a long time for me to connect to the live feed, and sometimes cannot connect at all. But, my wifi is working, so that wouldn't be the problem. Otherwise, I like how we can talk through the Ring and record footage and it detects motion well. And you can also adjust the sensitivity for it too
title: Good camera

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: 101stABN
content: Updated review, after spending a few mins on the phone with ring support I knew I was correct in that I purchased a good camera as the support was beyond stellar. Jason reviewed everything and after diagnostic testing had discovered I hadn't gotten an update that proved vital in my live video viewing. My camera is working better and more efficient than it had in the past. I can't wait to get the new doorbell when it comes out.
title: Very pleased

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Greg
content: I do like it because I can pick it up and move it around. Night Vison isn’t great unless there is a lot of light. I use it for my dogs outside (puppy training).
title: Not bad.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: David Fink
content: The picture is great even at night. Easy installation. The battery is still 2/3 charged after one month of operation. Setting motion detection I haven’t quite figured out yet. It doesn’t seem to follow the schedule right, but the quality is very good. I highly recommend this camera.
title: Best camera I have

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Lindsey
content: Overall pleased with item. I am rarely able to watch live view due to it not loading in enough time even though I have great internet speed. That said, the ability to view any motion later is still helpful.
title: Good quality picture, fairly easy setup

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Grace Birdz
content: Covers a large area great with night vision and all I needed was a step stool and a screwdriver to attach it above my garage door so far I'm loving this product
title: Great wifi camera, easy to install and connect to Wi-Fi

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: robbin rinehimer
content: was a gift for someone they said it works great with the solar power panel or plugged in the wall
title: works great

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Melody
content: I’m 68 and installed and set up both cameras myself. Great coverage and motions sensors work great
title: Great product and well worth the money

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Derek Murrell
content: Great addition to the ring, easy to install and appears in the ring app, picture quality is good too and WiFi connection is great, no issues with it at all
title: Great addition to the ring doorbell

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: AS from PA
content: The stick up cam does not have wide enough zones to reach the desired locations. There is no night vision. Which makes the camera useless.
title: Not good as the motion detector

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: GB
content: So far really disapointed i have older version still working with ring get this work wish could have returned
title: Older model better

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Teddy
content: Excellent product...does everything I wanted except connect to my alexa from my android phone.
title: Excellent camera

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: AmW
content: This thing rarely picks up our motions inside and it is awful at night. We wanted to use it for an outdoor space but we don’t trust that it’ll work like we need it to. Wouldn’t recommend it!
title: Don’t recommend it

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: KW
content: The best stick up camera as always. It is a must with the newest updates that they have done!!
title: A MUST!

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Andres Lara
content: Great camera! Excellent quality. Night view is awesome. Being able to change settings is awesome.
title: Excellent camera.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: CD
content: This is the biggest waste of money. It has not worked properly since installed. We even bought the solar panel so we wouldn’t have to charge  the battery constantly. It has yet to work, constantly having to reconnect, which is a complete nightmare, since you have to take it down and press a button. We have other ring products that work just fine. I would definitely not waste your money on this!
title: Junk

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Stoner Family
content: Battery is extremely good. I've had it on for 2 weeks and it says 72 percent left. During that time I've used it for motion detection and live viewing and talking. Also night vision works very well.
title: Great product

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: CheapyD
content: Was very disappointed to see there is a no integration with Ring Alarm. The only connection is they share the same app. There is no way to stop the cameras from recording when you are home (or the alarm is off). Even Canary cameras turn off (via geofencing) when you are home. The video quality and camera size are great, but these cameras need software updates to bring Ring Alarm integration.
title: No integration with Ring Alarm :-(

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Charles Culpepper
content: Works well. Range of motion detection is good. If I’m away from  home there is a delay in connecting to the ring app and sometimes I cannot connect at all.
title: Good product for the price

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: frank papa
content: VERY HAPPY WITH THIS DEVICE, SUPER EASY SETUP AND GREAT PICTURE. BATTERY LIFE SEEMS TO BE GOOD UP FOR 3 WEEKS STILL AT 94% BATTERY. JUST WAITING ON MY MOUNT KIT FOR PERMANENT MOUNTING TO BE DONE
title: GREAT CAMERA

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: DrReeder
content: This camera, with motion sensor and night vision, is exactly what I wanted. It also works beautifully with my Echo and Echo Dot.
title: I love this camera and I think you will too!

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Apple Fanatic
content: This product simply will not work. I’ve called Ring and they couldn’t get it to work. They sent another and the replacement won’t work either.
title: This device will not work as intended.

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: LouAnne Leddy
content: Motion detection is a little delayed to begin with and when trying to access the app it takes even longer while “processing.” I have the security cam looking out a window so I can not complain about the night vision. Even with that said Over all it is a good purchase and I would recommend the Ring system.
title: Security cam

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Steve
content: Works great. The night vision is very helpful and the app is very easy to use. Battery life is good but is shorter when it’s cold out.
title: Great camera!

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: pat
content: Function well...please set up before putting up...easy to put up!! Customer service was great!!
title: Great buy!!

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Tammy arbogast
content: Works great. Disabled and need to know who is coming into home. Coupled with outdoor cam there are no surprises that I can't handle. 🔫
title: Nice product

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Magpie
content: The camera gives a wide view but the picture quality is surprisingly poor for new technology.
title: Good not great

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Kll1223
content: This little camera packs a ton of power. Meaning it’s a great camera and has clear photos. I own two of them.
title: Great little camera

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Charlie D
content: Fine, although it may have missed a night visitor. I also realized after the fact no one is going to break in my front door, soooo, probably need to purchase multiple. At least for home security.
title: Fine

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Benjamin Porter
content: This was super easy to set up like most ring products. I ended up using an adhesive to attach it to the outside of my house because it is much easier than drilling into brick. My only complaint is that it is hard to see anything when it is raining and sometimes it is hard to see at night. Beyond that, it has a very clear picture and the motion detection works as expected
title: Easy To Setup, Hard to see at night

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Lowkey1229
content: These ring cameras are pure trash they have nerve charging a monthly fee for trash!
title: Trash

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: anthony thompson
content: I like how easy this is to set up, I have had it up outside for two weeks now. I use the speaking feature to talk back and forth with my kids when they are outside. The picture quality is crisp and I love that I can zoom in and move the picture around. The battery life is still at 80% which is awesome.
title: This camera works fantastic!

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: JBrock808
content: Super happy with my camera order. The Ring App is just so easy to use. Worth every penny!
title: Great Cams!

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Steve Bohner
content: Great product, but I spend a little more for versatility of a indoor/outdoor unit
title: Good product

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White

product: Ring Stick Up Cam Battery HD security camera with two-way talk, Works with Alexa - White
author: Yee
content: The zones for motion detection are left, right and center but they are not adjustable for distance.  So unless you can tilt the camera down far enough, things that you would like to ignore, such as pedestrians just passing by will trigger the motion sensor and send out unnecessary alerts.  So the pivot is too limited to do that.  If it could do that, then you could lose the view of the action that passes by when the camera has been triggered by motion.  You might not be able to see a car service or taxi that you ordered. The night vision is pretty good with the infrared.  If big nearby objects are in the view and reflecting the light back to the camera, then the camera is blinded because it functionally drops the aperture and darkens the intruder's face. The wifi seems pretty good but it may be necessary to use wifi extenders or have a mesh system to optimize the upload speed to get a better image that doesn't pixelate because of fast motion.  This is hard to test except with lab conditions.  Sometimes people in view seem to freeze for an annoying period of important time when they might otherwise be presenting their best face during the freeze period.  The units probably can't buffer enough data to deal with slow connections. My view with limited experience dealing with this kind of stuff.
title: What doesn't work well
